channel.title: Posts on Micro Services
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Micro Services

item.title: chat
item.description: Real time messaging API which enables Chat services to be embedded anywhere

item.title: etas
item.description: ETAs as a service. Provides single-pickup and multi-dropoff routes. Takes into account time and traffic.

item.title: feeds
item.description: A single uniform API for crawling and indexing RSS feeds

item.title: geocoding
item.description: Geocode an address to gps coordinates and the reverse. Geocoding service The geocoding service provides address to lat lng geocoding as well as the reverse.

item.title: location
item.description: Real time GPS location tracking and search Location Service Send, store and search real time gps point data and tracking info using the location API.

item.title: places
item.description: The places service stores places of interest by geolocation. Places Service Generated with

item.title: posts
item.description: The post service is responsible for storing and querying posts by their slugs or IDs.

item.title: routing
item.description: The routing service provides point to point directions. Routing Service Readme coming soon.

item.title: tags
item.description: Tag any resource by savin a tag associated with their ID in the tag service.

item.title: users
item.description: A user service for storing accounts and simple auth. Users Service Getting started micro run github.
